work.title: ComplianceOS
work.subtitle: End-to-end compliance automation platform for BFSI workflows
summary: I led the end-to-end build of ComplianceOS at OnFinance AI, from discovery and system design to delivery and iteration.
The platform automates compliance workflows and supports agentic analysis over large volumes of regulatory text.
highlights: End-to-end ownership: discovery → requirements → architecture → development → deployment → iteration
Engineered agentic workflows using LangGraph + LiteLLM for regulatory reasoning and automation
Reported impact: ~1250+ hours/year saved via compliance automation (internal estimate; scope varies by customer)
notes: This page is intentionally high-level; sensitive implementation details are omitted.
Happy to discuss architecture, tradeoffs, and results in an interview.
